hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`GAME_ID`, `GAME_RECORD`.`GAME_TYPE`, `TITLE`, `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS`, DATE_FORMAT(`GAME_FEEDBACK`.`CREATE_TIME`, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS `CREATE_TIME` FROM `GAME_FEEDBACK` LEFT JOIN `GAME_RECORD` ON `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`GAME_ID` = `GAME_RECORD`.`GAME_ID` WHERE `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` <> ? ORDER BY `CREATE_TIME` DESC
